Uses of Package
trivia

  • Classes in trivia used by trivia 
    Class and Description
    Actor
    Generic class for all objects in the game that both move and paint.
    Bullet
    A single point Actor that does not interact with others.
    Button
    Graphic representing a clickable area for game control.
    FightingActor
    The base class for an Actor that will participate in combat.
    GameEngine
    Handles all the game logic and painting based on the current game mode.
    GameMode
    Abstract class that contains all of the necessary methods for GameModes.
    Trivia
    The class that controls and owns all necessary objects.
